name: Psychic Processor
desc: You can banish this card you control; Special Summon up to 2 Machine, Psychic, and/or Cyberse monsters from your hand, and they can attack directly this turn. During the Standby Phase of the next turn after this card was banished: You can add this banished card to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Psychic Processor" once per turn.
